title: Vampirella's Summer Nights (1992) (Talon-Novus) [NVS-D]
description:
English | CBR | 54 Pages

Vampirella's Summer Nights
Publisher:  Harris Comics
Publication Date:  August 1992

Writers:  Steve Englehart and Kurt Busiek
Pencillers:  J.J. Birch, Dave Cockrum, James Fry, and Richard Howell
Inkers:  John Nyberg, Stan Shaw, Steve Leialoha, and Ricardo Villagran
Letterer:  Kevin Cunningham
Cover:  Art Adams and Richard Howell

Vampirella and her friends hit the beach with our summer special, Vampirella's Summer Nights. First up is a 16-page story in which Vampirella meets Creepy and Eerie. Shorter stories featuring the supporting cast follow, written by Kurt Busiek and drawn by Dave Cockrum, Stan Shaw, Richard Howell, James Fry, and Steve Leialoha. Rounding out the sizzling summer special will be a cover by Art Adams and a special Vampirella pinup by Brian Stelfreeze!

Thanks goes to Talon for this release.
